text: John Albert "Kayo" Dottley (August 25, 1928 - November 17, 2018) was an American football fullback in the National Football League. He played for the Chicago Bears from 1951 to 1953. He was born in Birmingham, Alabama. Dottley died at a hospital in Vicksburg, Mississippi from complications of pneumonia on November 17, 2018 at the age of 90.Ole Miss football icon Kayo Dottley passes away at 90 ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in Mississippi Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Sportspeople from Birmingham, Alabama
title: Kayo Dottley
